alert.note: Alert for Northern Black Hills; Northern Foot Hills; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 12:26PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Meade and east central Lawrence Counties through 100 PM MDT... At 1225 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Galena, or 5 miles southeast of Lead, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Southeastern Sturgis around 1245 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Fort Meade. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 32 and 34. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Black Hills; Northern Foot Hills; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
